A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What is everyone complaining about? This was a very well made movie with a great storyline\, good script\, amazing characters\, and beautiful cinematography. It has some classic Star Wars comedy without that Lucas’s campiness. It was different but had the same elements of the original movies. I like how it wasn’t storybook perfect and had catastrophic failures from our heroes. I kinda saw some twist coming but glad they went into that direction. See it for yourself with an open mind. Update: Some people said it was horrible script writing. I strongly suggest you don’t listen to that. EVERY ORIGINAL STAR WARS HAD HORRIFIC WRITING...but the elements and whimsy always made up for it. Those who think the writing of f this is worse than the others probably are not aware what script writing is really about. Someone said there was no character development. Yes there’s is but in their personality flaws. Heroes don’t always win and save the day\, they are “humans” who make great mistakes. If they did always win\, where’s the drama in that...
